meanings.sent1: The oversimple explanation left out important details.
meanings.sent2: She gave an oversimple answer to the complex question.
meanings.sent3: His oversimple solution to the puzzle made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The oversimple plot of the movie made it predictable.
meanings.sent5: The oversimple drawing failed to capture the beauty of the landscape.

meanings.definition: To make something too simple or simplistic.
meanings.sent1: Do not oversimple the instructions for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: He tends to oversimple complex issues in his speeches.
meanings.sent3: She always oversimples her recipes, and they turn out bland.
meanings.sent4: Trying to oversimple the problem only made it more confusing.
meanings.sent5: The teacher warned us not to oversimple the historical events in our essays.
